Package drcl.inet.application

Class Summary
BulkSink A byte stream sink which always has sufficient buffers for incoming data, and it always reports available buffers of dataUnit bytes.
BulkSource A byte stream source which always sends bytes as long as the receiver has sufficient buffers.
BulkSourceSink A byte stream source which always sends bytes as long as the receiver has sufficient buffers.
FileSource A byte stream source which simulates sending a file of limited size.
fsp A simple FSP (file service protocol) client.
fspd A simple FSP (File Service Protocol) server.
ftp This component implements a uni-directional file transfer protocol.
ftpd A simple FTP server.
McastTestApp Application component to test multicast routing.
SApplication Single-session (or simplified) application base class.
SUDPApplication Single-session (or simplified) UDP application base class.
